info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 3:25AM HST until December 10 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR LEEWARD KOHALA UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF HAWAII AND MAUI COUNTIES UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... .Trade winds will be especially strong today with wind speeds slowly decreasing on Saturday. The strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas between mountains. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with localized gusts over 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Maui and Hawaii Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down tree branches, blow away tents and unsecured objects, and make driving conditions difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Be prepared for possible power outages.
